name: 25 Squares - Tap Tap
description:
25 Squares - Tap Tap is a fun number puzzle game that easy to play but difficult to master. 
Love number games? Here come the beautiful number puzzle game for you. 
Just like the popular tile game of 2048, 1024 and threes!!!
25 Squares - Tap Tap is one of the addictive game and easy to play for everyone.
Find the same numbers, tap and grow.

******************** Features:
· Endless game play
· Easy to play, hard to master
· Simple and colorful design
· Beautiful music and sounds

**************************************

Android: https://play.google.com/store/...
